title: Launch Max para Maldo
description: WhatsApp assistant for Maldo Distributors. Automated cron jobs configured: (1) Hourly usage monitoring with spike detection, (2) Daily price checks in silent mode (9 AM PR time) collecting baseline data on 10 assumed products. Launch scheduled 9 AM Feb 21 - welcome messages to Jorge & Karla.

description: US Mobile number +1 407 969 2183 needs SMS verification. Try TextNow as alternative.

description: AppleScript works but slow. Need to optimize or use IMAP directly.

title: Fix broken cron jobs

title: Claude usage optimization & monitoring
description: Automated hourly usage checks with spike detection (>10%/hr alerts, >20%/3hr acceleration alerts, >80% threshold warnings). Currently using ~22% weekly. Maldo automation configured to use ~10% weekly. Goal: maximize value from Max plan subscription.

title: Dashboard fixes: Usage display + Recent docs
description: Fixed Claude usage not showing (added public/data sync) and docs not showing latest files (sorted ALL files by date, not just last 10). Auto-sync script runs hourly with usage cron job.

title: Fix cron job errors
description: Three jobs showing errors: (1) Fitness Morning Brief - delivery format ambiguous, (2) Claude Usage Monitor - cron announce delivery failed, (3) Vic Friday Deadline - timeout (60s limit). Need to diagnose and repair.

title: Setup GitHub Workspace Backup
description: Automated daily backup of workspace to private GitHub repo. Scripts ready, waiting for: 1) Create private repo, 2) Run setup script, 3) Enable cron job. Protects client data with disaster recovery.

title: Add workflow orchestration rules to Max
description: Updated SOUL.md with engineering best practices: plan mode default, subagent strategy, self-improvement loop, verification requirements, elegance standards, and autonomous bug fixing. Created tasks/lessons.md and tasks/todo.md for tracking.
